name: puppeteer
description: A high-level API to control headless Chrome over the DevTools Protocol

scripts.test: npm run lint --silent && npm run coverage && npm run test-doclint && npm run test-node6-transformer
scripts.lint: ([ "$CI" = true ] && eslint --quiet -f codeframe . || eslint .) && npm run tsc && npm run doc
